text: Va guftand: «On ci dar sikami in cahorpojon ast, [agar zinda mutavalid savad] ʙa mardoni mo ixtisos dorad va ʙar hamsaronamon harom sudaast, va [-le] agar [canin] murda ʙosad, hamai onon [az zanu mard] dar on sarikand. Ba zudi [Alloh taolo] ononro ʙa sazoi in tavsifason kajfar xohad dod. Ba rosti, ki U hakimi donost
